rules_text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, create a 1/1 white Mercenary creature token.
flavor_text: [i]One day, there was a new flier pinned to the bounty board. No one saw who put it there. “Tired of answerin' to Rattlesnake Jake? Join the Dust Devils and take your place in the new future of Starholme.”[/i]
